expected_behavior: Agent parses arguments: topic is the quoted string, format is 'socratic', expert count is 3
Agent identifies this as a deep conceptual inquiry appropriate for Socratic dialogue
Agent performs Research Grounding identifying key philosophical traditions (functionalism, phenomenology, integrated information theory, etc.)
Agent generates 3 personas with distinct traditions, at least one contrarian or bridge figure, and at least two different career stages
Agent loads references/formats.md for Socratic-specific phase structure (Deconstruct phase for challenging definitions)
Agent applies anti-clustering check to ensure no two panelists share the same tradition, methodology, and likely conclusions
Synthesis produces an emergent question that none of the 3 panelists started with
Agent produces between-phase summaries naming disagreements precisely with tradition attribution
